Save our four-legged friends!
In the prologue of the game, you will be able to learn some of the mechanics that will appear in the full version of the game. Animal Shelter Prologue grants you the opportunity to tackle the challenging but also highly rewarding task of running a refuge for strays and rescues. Witness firsthand how much effort goes into helping abandoned and injured animals as you handle a number of tasks necessary for your shelter to operate smoothly.


Clean Them
In the Animal Shelter Prologue, you will be able to take care of your proteges, one of the most interesting mechanics that will appear in the prologue as well as in the full version of the game is cleaning and taking care of these pets. There are many steps you will need to take to improve your health, and good hygiene is the first. Get your hands dirty a little so that their paws stay clean and their spirit rises high.


Protect Them
In the prologue of the game, one of your main tasks is to keep your pets safe. Thanks to the prologue, you will get to know each animal from a slightly wild side and it is your job as a responsible guardian to prevent it from exploding in any unpleasant way. Manage the animals well and keep the inhabitants of your refuge calm. This is one of the greater challenges that await you in the prologue of the game!


Take them for a walk
One of the most interesting mechanics in Animal Shelter Prologue are walks with pets! In the prologue of the game, you will be able to take your pets for a walk! What better way to burn off all that excess energy than a good, old-fashioned trot out in the fresh air? Keep your animals stimulated and entertained. You can be sure they'll be starved for attention!


Extend
Animal Shelter Prologue will present many challenges for you. Thanks to the ability to play the prologue, you will be faced with additional challenges. In the prologue of the game, the player will not only face the challenges of caring for animals, but also managing his shelter. Make sure to turn them into opportunities as you invest in your facilities and expand according to your growing needs.


Convince them
In Animal Shelter Prologue you will be able to experience part of the full game. The prologue of the game will be an amazing experience for players, before what awaits them in the full version of the game. Your ultimate goal in prolgou will be for the animal to go to a completely new, loving home. Take care of your rescue operations and make sure that they will be adopted by visitors to the shelter.
